Ephemeral application data and some static content appears here.

Explanation for some of the files that are in this folder:

- bannedip.txt: Add banned IP addresses here (one per line, with a semicolon separator 
  for the reason of the ban)
- public_blogs.php: Static content, used for listing community blogs the original 
  installation had at the time (recovered from an archive.org capture)
- spamwords.txt: Words that classify anonymous comments as spam (one per line)
